|brand = Tenda |model = AC18 |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = V7TAC18 |icid = 9034A-AC18 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0;BCM4708A0KFEBG; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W29N01GVSCAA; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16FP; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;454, 649E, 616;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85710-11;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = Tenda_XXXXXX,Tenda_XXXXXX_5G, |defaultssid_regex = ^Tenda_[A-F0-9]{6}(_5G)?$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = AsusWRT-Merlin, FreshTomato-ARM
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/13/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 885397270782 |ean = B01N6ETMVT |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/V7TAC18 V7TAC18] ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3133053 FCC Doc])
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.mbreviews.com/tenda-ac18-router-review/ ''Tenda AC18'' on '''MBReviews''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing Tomato=== [https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/tenda-ac18-help-and-guide.75192/post-311989 Joe A]
I'm pretty sure the upgrade function won't work from Merlin. This is what worked on my AC18:
#Download Fresh tomato for Tenda AC18 #Connect your laptop using network cable to the AC18 LAN port two. #fix your IP address to 192.168.0.10 netmask 255.255.255.0 #On your laptop ping 192.168.0.1 -t continuously #insert a paper clip into reset hole, hold on to it, and power on AC18 #once there is a response from the ping, release the paper clip #on your computer, bring up firefox and access 192.168.0.1 #From the firefox browser upload the firmware #A message will be shown on the firefox browser when it is completed. *Wait 12 minutes* after webpage shows complete. #Power off the AC18 and repeat step 4, 5, 6, 7 #This time, select restore default nvram values #Once it is done, AC18 will reboot again and it is ready for use. #Change your laptop's IP address to DHCP. #This time, the IP address of the router is changed to 192.168.1.1 and you can start the set up using firefox
I've run several experimental firmware changes on my AC18 (even a botched DD-WRT attempt) and these instructions always get me back although, as they say, your mileage may vary.
==See also== *[[Tenda AC6]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Wireless Router • [http://tendacn.com/en/product/AC6.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM53573B0 (WiSoC), BCM43217, RAM: 64MB <!--Winbond W9751G6KB-25--> *[[Tenda AC9]] - AC1200 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router • [http://tendacn.com/en/product/AC9.html PPage] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM47189B0 (WiSoC), BCM43217, BCM53125S <!--Winbond W631GG6KB-15, W25Q64FVSIG, SE2576L/SKY85728-11--> *[[Tenda AC15]] - AC1900 Smart Dual-Band Gigabit WiFi Router • [http://tendacn.com/en/product/AC15.html PPage] *[[Tenda W1800R]] - AC1750 Wireless Dual-Band Gigabit Router
[[Category:English Documentation]]
